Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model

Interface GameModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game
    public interface GameModel
    This is the interfaces that defines the game as the target for the methods of the Game State Machine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Game.State getStateIdentifier()  
      boolean pickGod​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String godName)
      Receive the godPick from the player
      boolean quitGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Quits the game

      Inputs coordinates in the game state (useful for builders placement phase)
      boolean submitGodList​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> godList)
      Receives the list of the names of the gods chosen by the host for the game

    • Method Detail

      • submitGodList

        boolean submitGodList​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> godList)
        Receives the list of the names of the gods chosen by the host for the game
        Parameters:
        godList - The list of the names of the gods chosen for the game, it should contain a number of valid god names equal to the number of the player in the game or it could be left empty (in this case a game with 3 "mortals" will be initialized
        Returns:
        true if this function call is legit for the current GameState and if godList is a valid list

      • pickGod

        boolean pickGod​(java.lang.String playerName,
                java.lang.String godName)
        Receive the godPick from the player
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player that chooses the god
        godName - the name of the god chosen
        Returns:
        true if this function call is legit for the current GameState

      • selectCoordinate

        boolean selectCoordinate​(java.lang.String playerName,
                         Coordinate coordinate)
        Inputs coordinates in the game state (useful for builders placement phase)
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player that selects the coordinate
        coordinate - The coordinate given to the model
        Returns:
        true if this function call is legit for the current GameState and if the parameters are valid

      • quitGame

        boolean quitGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Quits the game
        Parameters:
        playerName - Name of the player
        Returns:
        true if this function call is legit for the current GameState

      • getStateIdentifier

        Game.State getStateIdentifier()
        Returns:
        the state identifier of the current GameState
